```{Rcpp}

// [[Rcpp::plugins(cpp11)]]

#include <Rcpp.h> 
using namespace Rcpp;

// Simple equivalent to unlist
// [[Rcpp::export]]
IntegerVector combine_int(const List& list)
{
   std::size_t n = list.size();
   std::size_t total_length = 0;
   for (std::size_t i = 0; i < n; ++i) total_length += Rf_length(list[i]);
   IntegerVector output = no_init(total_length);
   std::size_t index = 0;
   for (std::size_t i = 0; i < n; ++i)
   {
      std::vector<int> el = list[i];
      std::copy(el.begin(), el.end(), output.begin() + index);
      index += el.size();
   }
   return output;
}

// [[Rcpp::export]]
List combine_lst(){
  std::vector< std::vector<int> > vec = std::vector< std::vector<int> >();
  for (int i = 0; i < 5; ++i){
    vec.push_back(std::vector<int>(10, 0));
  }
  return(wrap(&vec.at(1)));
}

// [[Rcpp::export]]
IntegerVector list_subset(const List& x, IntegerVector idx){
//  List lst_sub = x[idx];
  return(combine_int(x[idx]));
//  return(x[idx]);
}

```
